allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial project setup and Phase 1 foundation

- Initialize Next.js 16 with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4
- Install dependencies: @supabase/supabase-js, lucide-react, clsx
- Create comprehensive type system for normalized artifacts across museums
- Build all museum API normalizers \(Met, V&A, Cleveland, web scrape\)
- Implement Supabase Edge Functions for API proxying \(4 functions\)
- Create localStorage session collection with CRUD operations
- Build custom hooks: useTheme, useCollection, useSearch, useDebounce
- Add unified search orchestrator for parallel multi-museum queries
- Configure remote image domains for museum CDNs
- Set up dark mode with Tailwind v4 custom variants
- Create UI primitives: Badge, LoadingSpinner, ErrorMessage, EmptyState, ThemeToggle
- Build Header component with navigation and collection count

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
